marklogic.body: Personally, I hate trolling. I just want to get claw Off our boards. I would much rather talk baseball with the boys over there, Fergie, Halo Pride, Arch, Macleod, Donny and the rest of them.Â I think all trolls are bad. I know I'm being a slight hypocrite with that statement considering what I'm doing. But whatever.Â And I'm self employed. I have an internet marketing company that makes plenty of money whether I work or not. I love baseball, I Bleed Angel Red.. Which is why I want my dang forum back.Â NotArch, I don't want to tell ya what to do. But it sure would be cool if you stopped trolling these boards IF GIIVEEMCLAWANTLER stops trolling our boards. Again, there is nothing I can do to stop ya.. Just a humble request so we can get back to talking Angel baseball and these guys can get back to talking Ranger ball. It's one thing to talk a little smack every now and then. It's a whole other to troll.Â It's just a request notArch.Â
